about.details:
Incorporated in 2003 by the Ministry of Railways India (MoR), Rail Vikas Nigam Limited (RVNL) is a project executing agency.

What does RVNL do?
RVNL is engaged in the business of mobilization of financial resources, rail project development, enhance golden quadrilateral and port connectivity by implementing rail projects and raise extra-budgetary resources for Indian Railway project execution. RVNL is involved in a verity of rail projects such as the construction of cable-stayed bridges, major bridges, workshops, metro projects, railway electrification, gauge conversion, new lines, doubling, and institutional buildings.

RVNL Project Summary
MoR has assigned 172 projects to the RVNL till Feb 2019 and out of which 166 projects are executed. As of Dec 2018, an order book size is Rs 77,504.28 Cr. The company also charge an annual consolidated management fee from MoR including execution of 10% for national projects, 9.25% for the metro projects, and 8.50% for other plan heads.

RVNL Clients
Indian Railway is the major client of the company and public sector undertakings, state, and central government departments, ministries are the other clients.

RVNL Financial Summary
The net profit of the company in FY 2015, 2016, 2017 is Rs 3,368.49 million, Rs 4,294.34 million, Rs 4,434.87 million and Rs 2,359.35 million, respectively.

RVNL Competitive Strengths
The competitive strengths of the company are:
1. Consistent financial track record
2. Undergo different categories of projects
3. Authorized by MoR
4. Standardized operation process
5. Trained Professional and workforce

contactDetails.full_address: Rail Vikas Nigam Limited, Rail Vikas Nigam Limited 1 st floor, August Kranti Bhawan Bhikaji Cama Place, R. K. Puram New Delhi 110 066

faqs.question: What is the Rail Vikas IPO?
faqs.answer:
Rail Vikas IPO is a main-board IPO of 253457280 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹481.57 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹19 per share. The minimum order quantity is 780.

The IPO opens on March 29, 2019, and closes on April 3, 2019.

Alankit Assignments Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Rail Vikas IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Rail Vikas IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Rail Vikas IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Rail Vikas IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Rail Vikas IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Rail Vikas IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Rail Vikas IPO opens on March 29, 2019 and closes on April 3, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Rail Vikas IPO?
faqs.answer: Rail Vikas IPO lot size is 780, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,820.

faqs.question: How to apply for Rail Vikas IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Rail Vikas IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Rail Vikas IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Rail Vikas IPO will be done on Monday, April 8, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, April 9, 2019. Check the Rail Vikas IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Rail Vikas IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Rail Vikas IPO listing date is on Thursday, April 11, 2019.

reservation.summary: Rail Vikas IPO offers 253457280 shares. 126400000 (49.87%) to QIB 37920000 (14.96%) to NII 88480000 (34.91%) to RII 657280 (0.26%) to employees. 113435 RIIs will receive minimum 780 shares and (sNII) and (bNII) will receive minimum 10920 shares. (in case of oversubscription)

subscriptionStatus.summary: The Rail Vikas IPO is subscribed 1.82 times on April 3 2019 6:49:01 PM (Day 4). The public issue subscribed 2.92 times in the retail category 1.36 times in the QIB category and 0.8 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
